title: Mt. Gox rumors panic Bitcoin Twitter as BTC price returns below $20K
description: Claims that 137,000 BTC are about to be offloaded on the open market are met with intense suspicion as BTC price volatility returns.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Bitcoin price briefly falls below $20K on ‘bunch of nothing’ Powell speech
description: Bitcoin could well sink below the $20,000 mark again, traders warn, with price targets now as low as $16,000.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Looks bare: OpenSea turns into NFT ghost-town after volume plunges 99% in 90 days
description: An ongoing debt crisis at lending platform BendDAO is also increasing the risk the NFT bubble will burst.
author: Cointelegraph By  Yashu Gola

title: US stocks lose $1.25T in a day — more than entire crypto market cap
description: Risk assets take a major blow as Fed Chair Jerome Powell stays firmly hawkish on inflation and monetary policy.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Hetzner anti-crypto policies: A wake-up call for Ethereum’s future
description: The terms of services, laid down by Ethereum’s second-biggest host Hetzner, prohibits customers from running nodes, mining and farming, plotting, storage of blockchain data and trading.
author: Cointelegraph By  Arijit Sarkar

title: Bitcoin risks worst August since 2015 as hodlers brace for ‘Septembear’
description: Serious cold feet over the outlook for monthly timeframes with September historically a “red” month.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: US dollar hits new 20-year high — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
description: A familiar tale of losing stocks and a surging greenback greets Bitcoin traders this week as $20,000 fails to sustain as support.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: These 3 altcoins have completely ignored the bear market in the last 90 days
description: Several altcoins have not only outperformed Bitcoin and Ethereum in the last three months but have also posted impressive gains.
author: Cointelegraph By  Yashu Gola

title: Bitcoin reaches ‘short squeeze’ trigger zone as BTC price nears $20.4K
description: Those betting on further downside begin to see setbacks as Bitcoin starts the Wall Street trading week with a spike higher.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Mt. Gox creditors dismiss rumors of massive Bitcoin dump
description: Mt. Gox creditor Eric Wall said that at the moment, creditors are still unable to register where the funds should be sent to.
author: Cointelegraph By  Ezra Reguerra

title: Cardano outranks Bitcoin in global top intimate brands in new report
description: The blockchain developer ranks 26 out of 600 global brands in a new report which analyzes consumers’ emotional connection to brands.
author: Cointelegraph By  Savannah Fortis

title: Price analysis 8/29: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, SOL, DOGE, DOT, SHIB, MATIC
description: Bitcoin bulls are fighting to hold the $20,000 level and several altcoins have seized upon the range-bound trading by rallying up to 10%.
author: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay

title: Ripple CEO comments on Crypto Leaks, denies funding law firm to target others
description: Kyle Roche allegedly approached Ripple's CEO to invest in a law firm that would target competitor firms with lawsuits like those Ripple was facing in the United States.
author: Cointelegraph By  Prashant Jha

title: NFTs Gaming CEO apologizes for losing 12% of startup capital through crypto trading
description: 0xfanfaron has vouched to personally compensate the firm's treasury for all trading losses.
author: Cointelegraph By  Zhiyuan Sun

title: Dubai issues crypto marketing rules to better protect investors
description: Dubai's new Virtual Asset Regulatory Authority requires more clarity and transparency from industry marketers and promoters to protect investors.
author: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz

title: Ripple counsel: SEC's shakedowns leave consumers holding the bag
description: The response comes as Ripple Labs and other critics believe the SEC has overstepped its mark on the enforcement of the crypto space.
author: Cointelegraph By   Brayden Lindrea

title: Meta announces Facebook and Instagram users can post NFTs from digital wallets
description: “This will enable people to connect their digital wallets once to either app in order to share their digital collectibles across both,” said Meta.
author: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright

title: Lawyer Roche alleges statements he made about Ava Labs are false, the result of intoxication
description: He claims that the recordings were a setup by a third party to discredit the lawyer and his firm, but the “whistleblowing” website is standing by its story.
author: Cointelegraph By   Derek Andersen

title: Ethereum scaling network Arbitrum set for major upgrade on Aug. 31
description: The Nitro upgrade will further improve the transaction fee crisis that has plagued the growth of the Ethereum network over the last two years.
author: Cointelegraph By   Brayden Lindrea

title: Where in the world are the 3AC founders? Speculation abounds
description: Rumor has it that they are heading to, or are already in, Dubai, says a lawyer with 30 years of experience. But can they stay there forever?
author: Cointelegraph By   Wahid Pessarlay
